name: WWII Tanks Battle
description:
Immerse yourself in a world of armored tank battles. Choose from a wide range of famous tanks of 

the major combatants. Pick the best tank and blast your way across the battlefield. Defeat your enemies 

with force and strategic decisions! And lead your team on a glorious road to victory!

Game Features:

Wide selection of famous WWII tanks: 

Tiger 1

T-34/76

T-34/85

KV-I

KV-II

BT-7

BT-42

Type 89 (Japanese Middle Tank)

Sherman Firefly

and many more.
